solution_line_template: If she's saving half her salary every month, she saves {saving_fraction}*${monthly_earnings} = $<<{saving_fraction}*{monthly_earnings}={monthly_savings}>>{monthly_savings} every month.

If the vehicle is worth ${vehicle_cost}, and she saves ${monthly_savings} every month to buy it, she will have to save for {vehicle_cost}/{monthly_savings} = <<{vehicle_cost}/{monthly_savings}={months_to_save}>>{months_to_save} months.
